subheading: MyEtherWallet (簡稱為 MEW) is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Ethereum blockchain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain an ETH address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: 發送或交換您的 ETH 與 tokens, 購買 ENS 網域, 與智慧合約互動等! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: MyEtherWallet - 請稱呼我們為 MEW - 將 Ethereum blockchain 放在您的指尖。 We are a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your ETH and ERC-20 tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away ETH. Cheers!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the Ethereum blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: MEW 支援全部的主流硬體錢包（包含了 Ledger，Trezor 等）。
aboutSwapDesc: MEW 和 Bity，Kyber Network，Changelly，與 Simplex 是合作夥伴。讓您能通過這些服務來交易法幣對加密貨幣交易對、、ETH 對 BTC 交易對、與 ETH 對 ERC-20 交易對。
aboutMewConnectDesc: MEW's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
lostTitle: 糟了！看起來您迷失了方向。
howToCreateWalletDesc: MyEtherWallet (MEW) 提供三種方式來建議新的 ETH 錢包，包含了 MEWconnect，Keystore 檔案，或者助記詞 想知道更多資訊，請點擊
whatIsMewConnectDesc: MEWconnect is our companion mobile app for MyEtherWallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones! 更多資訊請點擊
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: MEW 能與其他的錢包共通嗎？
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: MEW 支援多種不同的錢包，包含硬體錢包（如：Ledger Nano S 或者 Trezor），以及第三方的錢包像是 MetaMask。 We are also open for anyone to use their Ethereum wallets with the appropriate information. 更多資訊請點擊
howToSendTxTitle: 我該如何發送一筆交易？
howToSendTxDesc: MEW lets anyone with a balance of ETH or ERC20 tokens send a transaction, without additional charges. Using the Ethereum blockchain takes gas, which is paid for in ETH, so we recommend having at least .01 ETH to cover around 2 - 3 transactions. Read more
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: 我忘了我的密碼/私鑰！我能做什麼？
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: MEW 並不提供幫忙復原或者重設密碼/私鑰的支援。我們非常建議您在實體的紙上面寫下密碼與私鑰以安全地保存您的資料。或者將其存在您的電腦上。更多資訊請點擊
welcomeToV5Desc1: 歡迎來到全新的 MEW！如果這次您第一次拜訪，看看我們的 {0} 吧！
welcomeToV5Desc2: 經典版 MEW 依然能被使用 {0}，可以到網頁底部找到相關資訊。
welcomeToLink1: 來看看我們在 Medium 上面的最新消息
